scripts.install:workspaces: npm run install:user && npm run install:admin && npm run install:corporate
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/user dist/admin dist/corporate && npm run build:user && npm run build:admin && npm run build:corporate && cp -r user/dist/* dist/user/ && cp -r admin/dist/* dist/admin/ && cp -r corporate/dist/* dist/corporate/ && echo '<!DOCTYPE html><html><head><meta http-equiv="refresh" content="0;url=/user/"></head><body>Redirecting...</body></html>' > dist/index.html
